q: Nearly all the sports practised nowadays __________ competitive.
Every student __________ going to be responsible for his chap- ters and each student __________ bring his or her homework on the exam day.
With your cooperation, we __________ win the match.
The children of the man who works with me __________ broken the window this morning.
Either the sculpture or the paintings __________ in the museum today.
Neither the students nor their instructor __________ happy with the long cafeteria line for squid eyeball stew.
One scorching summer, the desert became dry, and there was no water left for the plants. The rose quickly __________ to wilt.
The chance to mentor a group of underprivileged students helped me __________ the educational disparities in our society.
Bread and butter __________ our daily food.
Summer is an ideal time to take a hike, especially if you __________ the opportunity to explore one of our country’s many state and national parks.
The bouquet of red roses __________ so sweet.
One of my close friends __________ us a question that neither of us __________ able to answer.
None of my friends __________ there.
The opportunity to volunteer at the local food bank made me __________ the challenges faced by underprivileged com- munities.
Each of the boys __________ rewarded.
Nobody in the classroom __________ able to answer the question about subject - verb agreement yesterday.
We __________ by the river, but unfortunately, the riverside car park was full.
Everybody at the party __________ enjoying the food.
Few students who __________ playing football missed the class.
His offence was grave but he __________ with a fine.
After the meeting, he said a great deal of advice __________.
One of the books __________ been missing.
One of the flowers __________ wilted.
Each of these women __________ that she had read the care instructions before washing the delicate and expensive dresses.
Neither the man nor his son __________ convinced of the idea.
